title: Implement AI-powered gating test verification system
description: Deploy an AI system to automatically verify gating test results and quality, providing intelligent test validation with confidence scores and explanations
iWant: an AI system to automatically verify gating test results and quality
soThat: I can ensure reliable deployments with intelligent test validation
acceptanceCriteria: AI system analyzes gating test results within 30 seconds
Provides confidence score (0-100%) for each test verification
Integrates with existing CI/CD pipeline without disruption
Maintains audit trail of all AI decisions and reasoning
